data.title: UNEXPECTED DELIGHT
data.text: The place looks a little rundown but the food was very good.  Wandered in on 2 for 1 day(Monday's) for Buffalo Wings great value and tasty.  Excellent onion rings fresh made.

data.title: Poor Service
data.text: I can't review the food offered at this restaurant.  I never got any.  Waited to order, watched others who ordered after me get food.  Looked at my watch and recognized that my scheduled lunch time would expire prior to getting back to work.  Won't ever go back.

data.title: Fun place to be
data.text: The place is really cool. It is my first visit. Waitress takes our order right away and give us drinks as soon as she can. Their buffalo wings are great and so is their garlic parmesan wings. The only thing that is not quite right are their waitresses, they need to smile. They seem frustrated, tried and not so friendly at all. They asked us from time to time how we are doing but never gave us a smile. I told my husband to give her enough tip so she can go buy some smile. But other than that, all is well.

data.title: MUCHAS PANTALLAS.
data.text: Si te gustan los deportes y las alitas, llegaste al citio correcto, tiene muchas pantallas y es agradable.
